languages.text: "Я не... я..." {n}Бледное лицо заливает стыдливый румянец, но Кассия быстро берет себя в руки:{/n} "Простите мне столь досадную оплошность, Лорд-капитан. Иногда книги завлекают меня настолько, что я теряюсь среди страниц, позабыв о реальном мире. Вы что-то хотели?"

traits.locale_text: "Я не... я..." {n}Бледное лицо заливает стыдливый румянец, но Кассия быстро берет себя в руки:{/n} "Простите мне столь досадную оплошность, Лорд-капитан. Иногда книги завлекают меня настолько, что я теряюсь среди страниц, позабыв о реальном мире. Вы что-то хотели?"

languages.text: "I... I did not..." {n}A blush of embarrassment tinges her pallid features, but she regains her composure quickly.{/n} "Please forgive me this regrettable lapse, Lord Captain. There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"
languages.original_text: "Я не... я..." {n}Бледное лицо заливает стыдливый румянец, но Кассия быстро берет себя в руки:{/n} "Простите мне столь досадную оплошность, Лорд-капитан. Иногда книги завлекают меня настолько, что я теряюсь среди страниц, позабыв о реальном мире. Вы что-то хотели?"

traits.locale_text: "I... I did not..." {n}A blush of embarrassment tinges her pallid features, but she regains her composure quickly.{/n} "Please forgive me this regrettable lapse, Lord Captain. There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and well forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and well forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

"I... I did not..." {n}A blush of embarrassment tinges her pallid features, but she regains her composure quickly.{/n} "Please forgive me this regrettable lapse, Lord Captain. There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

"I... I did not..." {n}A blush of embarrassment tinges her pallid features, but she regains her composure quickly.{/n} "Please forgive me this regrettable lapse, Lord Captain. There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

languages.text: "Ich ... Ich wollte nicht ..." {n}Ihre bleichen Züge nehmen eine leichte Färbung der Scham an, doch sie findet ihre Fassung schnell wieder.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht mir diesen bedauerlichen Fehler, Lord Captain. Ich verliere mich manchmal in den Seiten von Büchern und vergesse darüber ganz die Existenz der Welt außen herum. Kann ich etwas für Euch tun?"
languages.original_text: "I... I did not..." {n}A blush of embarrassment tinges her pallid features, but she regains her composure quickly.{/n} "Please forgive me this regrettable lapse, Lord Captain. There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... Ich wollte nicht ..." {n}Ihre bleichen Züge nehmen eine leichte Färbung der Scham an, doch sie findet ihre Fassung schnell wieder.{/n} "Bitte verzeiht mir diesen bedauerlichen Fehler, Lord Captain. Ich verliere mich manchmal in den Seiten von Büchern und vergesse darüber ganz die Existenz der Welt außen herum. Kann ich etwas für Euch tun?"

languages.text: « Je... je ne voulais pas... » {n}commence Cassia, dont la gêne fait rougir sa peau pâle, mais elle se ressaisit rapidement.{/n} « Veuillez me pardonner ce manquement regrettable, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je me laisse parfois absorber par les livres, je me perds entre leurs pages et j'en oublie le monde qui m'entoure. Puis-je faire quelque chose pour vous ? »
languages.original_text: "I... I did not..." {n}A blush of embarrassment tinges her pallid features, but she regains her composure quickly.{/n} "Please forgive me this regrettable lapse, Lord Captain. There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

traits.locale_text: « Je... je ne voulais pas... » {n}commence Cassia, dont la gêne fait rougir sa peau pâle, mais elle se ressaisit rapidement.{/n} « Veuillez me pardonner ce manquement regrettable, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je me laisse parfois absorber par les livres, je me perds entre leurs pages et j'en oublie le monde qui m'entoure. Puis-je faire quelque chose pour vous ? »

languages.text: “我……我不是有意……”{n}一抹窘迫的红云浮上卡西娅苍白的面颊，但她很快有恢复了镇定。{/n}“请原谅我的疏忽，舰长大人。有时我读书会太过入迷，甚至会忘记自己，忘记外面的世界。请问，你找我有什么事吗？”
languages.original_text: "I... I did not..." {n}A blush of embarrassment tinges her pallid features, but she regains her composure quickly.{/n} "Please forgive me this regrettable lapse, Lord Captain. There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

traits.locale_text: “我……我不是有意……”{n}一抹窘迫的红云浮上卡西娅苍白的面颊，但她很快有恢复了镇定。{/n}“请原谅我的疏忽，舰长大人。有时我读书会太过入迷，甚至会忘记自己，忘记外面的世界。请问，你找我有什么事吗？”

languages.text: 「私…私は、そうではなく…」{n}青白い表情が恥じらいの色に染まるが、彼女はすぐに落ち着きを取り戻す。{/n}「この悔やまれる過ちをお許しください、ロード・キャプテン。私は時に本に気を取られ、本のページに迷い込み、世界の存在を忘れてしまうのです。私に何かご用でしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "I... I did not..." {n}A blush of embarrassment tinges her pallid features, but she regains her composure quickly.{/n} "Please forgive me this regrettable lapse, Lord Captain. There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

traits.locale_text: 「私…私は、そうではなく…」{n}青白い表情が恥じらいの色に染まるが、彼女はすぐに落ち着きを取り戻す。{/n}「この悔やまれる過ちをお許しください、ロード・キャプテン。私は時に本に気を取られ、本のページに迷い込み、世界の存在を忘れてしまうのです。私に何かご用でしょうか？」

languages.text: «Yo... Yo no...». {n}La vergüenza tiñe sus rasgos pálidos, pero recupera la compostura rápidamente.{/n} «Perdone este lamentable lapsus, por favor, Lord Capitán. Los libros me absorben a veces, me pierdo en sus páginas y me olvido de la existencia del mundo. ¿Quería algo de mí?».
languages.original_text: "I... I did not..." {n}A blush of embarrassment tinges her pallid features, but she regains her composure quickly.{/n} "Please forgive me this regrettable lapse, Lord Captain. There are times when books sweep me up, and I lose myself in their pages and forget about the world's existence. Was there something you required of me?"

Los libros me absorben a veces, me pierdo en sus páginas y me olvido de la existencia del mundo. ¿Quería algo de mí?».
